SourceProxy.name: CGALPolygonOffset
SourceProxy.label: CGAL Polygon Offset
SourceProxy.Documentation: Offset the edges of a simple 2D polygon (closed curve) to interior or exterior regions formed by the polygon.The polygon must belong to XY plane and input must be a closed curve.

IntVectorProperty.name: OffsetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The direction of polygon offset. Interior means bounded region and Exterior means unbounded region formed by the polygon.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Offset
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The value used to offset the polygon.
